directions: Mix brown sugar, sea salt, paprika, black pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, cumin, sage, red pepper flakes, chili powder, and thyme in a bowl until well blended. Store in an airtight container.
ingredients: 1 pinch crushed red pepper, or to taste
1 pinch chili powder, or to taste
1 pinch dried thyme, or to taste
title: Burger Spice Rub
